verses.verse: Then<WG5119> came<WG4334> to Jesus<WG2424> scribes<WG1122> and<WG2532> Pharisees<WG5330>, which were of<WG575> Jerusalem<WG2414>, saying<WG3004>,

Why<WG1302> do thy<WG4675> disciples<WG3101> transgress<WG3845> the tradition<WG3862> of the elders<WG4245>? for<WG1063> they wash<WG3538> not<WG3756> their<WG846> hands<WG5495> when<WG3752> they eat<WG2068> bread<WG740>.

But<WG1161> he answered<WG611> and said<WG2036> unto them<WG846>, Why<WG1302> do ye<WG5210> also<WG2532> transgress<WG3845> the commandment<WG1785> of God<WG2316> by<WG1223> your<WG5216> tradition<WG3862>?

For<WG1063> God<WG2316> commanded<WG1781>, saying<WG3004>, Honour<WG5091> thy<WG4675> father<WG3962> and<WG2532> mother<WG3384>: and<WG2532>, He that curseth<WG2551> father<WG3962> or<WG2228> mother<WG3384>, let him die<WG5053> the death<WG2288>.

But<WG1161> ye<WG5210> say<WG3004>, Whosoever<WG3739> <WG302> shall say<WG2036> to his father<WG3962> or<WG2228> his mother<WG3384>, It is a gift<WG1435>, by<WG1537> whatsoever<WG3739> <WG1437> thou mightest be profited<WG5623> by me<WG1700>;

And<WG2532> honour<WG5091> not<WG3364> his<WG846> father<WG3962> or<WG2228> his<WG846> mother<WG3384>, he shall be free. Thus<WG2532> have ye made<WG208> the commandment<WG1785> of God<WG2316> of none effect<WG208> by<WG1223> your<WG5216> tradition<WG3862>.
Ye hypocrites<WG5273>, well<WG2573> did<WG4395> Esaias<WG2268> prophesy<WG4395> of<WG4012> you<WG5216>, saying<WG3004>,

This<WG3778> people<WG2992> draweth nigh<WG1448> unto me<WG3427> with their<WG846> mouth<WG4750>, and<WG2532> honoureth<WG5091> me<WG3165> with their lips<WG5491>; but<WG1161> their<WG846> heart<WG2588> is<WG568> far<WG4206> from<WG575> me<WG1700>.
But<WG1161> in vain<WG3155> they do worship<WG4576> me<WG3165>, teaching<WG1321> for doctrines<WG1319> the commandments<WG1778> of men<WG444>.
And<WG2532> he called<WG4341> the multitude<WG3793>, and said<WG2036> unto them<WG846>, Hear<WG191>, and<WG2532> understand<WG4920>:

Not<WG3756> that which goeth<WG1525> into<WG1519> the mouth<WG4750> defileth<WG2840> a man<WG444>; but<WG235> that which cometh<WG1607> out of<WG1537> the mouth<WG4750>, this<WG5124> defileth<WG2840> a man<WG444>.

Then<WG5119> came<WG4334> his<WG846> disciples<WG3101>, and said<WG2036> unto him<WG846>, Knowest thou<WG1492> that<WG3754> the Pharisees<WG5330> were offended<WG4624>, after they heard<WG191> this saying<WG3056>?

But<WG1161> he answered<WG611> and said<WG2036>, Every<WG3956> plant<WG5451>, which<WG3739> my<WG3450> heavenly<WG3770> Father<WG3962> hath<WG5452> not<WG3756> planted<WG5452>, shall be rooted up<WG1610>.

Let<WG863> them<WG846> alone<WG863>: they be<WG1526> blind<WG5185> leaders<WG3595> of the blind<WG5185>. And<WG1161> if<WG1437> the blind<WG5185> lead<WG3594> the blind<WG5185>, both<WG297> shall fall<WG4098> into<WG1519> the ditch<WG999>.
Then<WG1161> answered<WG611> Peter<WG4074> and said<WG2036> unto him<WG846>, Declare<WG5419> unto us<WG2254> this<WG5026> parable<WG3850>.
And<WG1161> Jesus<WG2424> said<WG2036>, Are<WG2075> ye<WG5210> also<WG2532> yet<WG188> without understanding<WG801>?

Do<WG3539> not<WG3768> ye<WG3539> yet<WG3768> understand<WG3539>, that<WG3754> whatsoever<WG3956> entereth in<WG1531> at<WG1519> the mouth<WG4750> goeth<WG5562> into<WG1519> the belly<WG2836>, and<WG2532> is cast out<WG1544> into<WG1519> the draught<WG856>?
But<WG1161> those things which<WG3588> proceed<WG1607> out of<WG1537> the mouth<WG4750> come forth<WG1831> from<WG1537> the heart<WG2588>; and they<WG2548> defile<WG2840> the man<WG444>.

For<WG1063> out of<WG1537> the heart<WG2588> proceed<WG1831> evil<WG4190> thoughts<WG1261>, murders<WG5408>, adulteries<WG3430>, fornications<WG4202>, thefts<WG2829>, false witness<WG5577>, blasphemies<WG988>:
These<WG5023> are<WG2076> the things which<WG3588> defile<WG2840> a man<WG444>: but<WG1161> to eat<WG5315> with unwashen<WG449> hands<WG5495> defileth<WG2840> not<WG3756> a man<WG444>.
Then<WG2532> Jesus<WG2424> went<WG1831> thence<WG1564>, and departed<WG402> into<WG1519> the coasts<WG3313> of Tyre<WG5184> and<WG2532> Sidon<WG4605>.

And<WG2532>, behold<WG2400>, a woman<WG1135> of Canaan<WG5478> came<WG1831> out of<WG575> the same<WG1565> coasts<WG3725>, and cried<WG2905> unto him<WG846>, saying<WG3004>, Have mercy<WG1653> on me<WG3165>, O Lord<WG2962>, thou Son<WG5207> of David<WG1138>; my<WG3450> daughter<WG2364> is grievously<WG2560> vexed with a devil<WG1139>.

But<WG1161> he answered<WG611> her<WG846> not<WG3756> a word<WG3056>. And<WG2532> his<WG846> disciples<WG3101> came<WG4334> and besought<WG2065> him<WG846>, saying<WG3004>, Send<WG630> her<WG846> away<WG630>; for<WG3754> she crieth<WG2896> after<WG3693> us<WG2257>.
But<WG1161> he answered<WG611> and said<WG2036>, I am<WG649> not<WG3756> sent<WG649> but<WG1508> unto<WG1519> the lost<WG622> sheep<WG4263> of the house<WG3624> of Israel<WG2474>.
Then<WG1161> came she<WG2064> and worshipped<WG4352> him<WG846>, saying<WG3004>, Lord<WG2962>, help<WG997> me<WG3427>.
But<WG1161> he answered<WG611> and said<WG2036>, It is<WG2076> not<WG3756> meet<WG2570> to take<WG2983> the children's<WG5043> bread<WG740>, and<WG2532> to cast<WG906> it to dogs<WG2952>.

And<WG1161> she said<WG2036>, Truth<WG3483>, Lord<WG2962>: yet<WG2532> <WG1063> the dogs<WG2952> eat<WG2068> of<WG575> the crumbs<WG5589> which<WG3588> fall<WG4098> from<WG575> their<WG846> masters'<WG2962> table<WG5132>.

Then<WG5119> Jesus<WG2424> answered<WG611> and said<WG2036> unto her<WG846>, O<WG5599> woman<WG1135>, great<WG3173> is thy<WG4675> faith<WG4102>: be it<WG1096> unto thee<WG4671> even as<WG5613> thou wilt<WG2309>. And<WG2532> her<WG846> daughter<WG2364> was made whole<WG2390> from<WG575> that very<WG1565> hour<WG5610>.

And<WG2532> Jesus<WG2424> departed<WG3327> from thence<WG1564>, and came<WG2064> nigh unto<WG3844> the sea<WG2281> of Galilee<WG1056>; and<WG2532> went up<WG305> into<WG1519> a mountain<WG3735>, and sat down<WG2521> there<WG1563>.

And<WG2532> great<WG4183> multitudes<WG3793> came<WG4334> unto him<WG846>, having<WG2192> with<WG3326> them those that were <WG1438> lame<WG5560>, blind<WG5185>, dumb<WG2974>, maimed<WG2948>, and<WG2532> many<WG4183> others<WG2087>, and<WG2532> cast<WG4496> them<WG846> down<WG4496> at<WG3844> Jesus'<WG2424> feet<WG4228>; and<WG2532> he healed<WG2323> them<WG846>:

Insomuch that<WG5620> the multitude<WG3793> wondered<WG2296>, when they saw<WG991> the dumb<WG2974> to speak<WG2980>, the maimed<WG2948> to be whole<WG5199>, the lame<WG5560> to walk<WG4043>, and<WG2532> the blind<WG5185> to see<WG991>: and<WG2532> they glorified<WG1392> the God<WG2316> of Israel<WG2474>.

Then<WG1161> Jesus<WG2424> called<WG4341> his<WG846> disciples<WG3101> unto him, and said<WG2036>, I have compassion<WG4697> on<WG1909> the multitude<WG3793>, because<WG3754> they continue<WG4357> with me<WG3427> now<WG2235> three<WG5140> days<WG2250>, and<WG2532> have<WG2192> nothing<WG3756> <WG5101> to eat<WG5315>: and<WG2532> I will<WG2309> not<WG3756> send<WG630> them<WG846> away<WG630> fasting<WG3523>, lest<WG3379> they faint<WG1590> in<WG1722> the way<WG3598>.

And<WG2532> his<WG846> disciples<WG3101> say<WG3004> unto him<WG846>, Whence<WG4159> should we<WG2254> have so much<WG5118> bread<WG740> in<WG1722> the wilderness<WG2047>, as<WG5620> to fill<WG5526> so great<WG5118> a multitude<WG3793>?

And<WG2532> Jesus<WG2424> saith<WG3004> unto them<WG846>, How many<WG4214> loaves<WG740> have ye<WG2192>? And<WG1161> they said<WG2036>, Seven<WG2033>, and<WG2532> a few<WG3641> little fishes<WG2485>.
And<WG2532> he commanded<WG2753> the multitude<WG3793> to sit down<WG377> on<WG1909> the ground<WG1093>.

And<WG2532> he took<WG2983> the seven<WG2033> loaves<WG740> and<WG2532> the fishes<WG2486>, and gave thanks<WG2168>, and brake<WG2806> them, and<WG2532> gave<WG1325> to his<WG846> disciples<WG3101>, and<WG1161> the disciples<WG3101> to the multitude<WG3793>.

And<WG2532> they did<WG5315> all<WG3956> eat<WG5315>, and<WG2532> were filled<WG5526>: and<WG2532> they took up<WG142> of the broken<WG2801> meat that was left<WG4052> seven<WG2033> baskets<WG4711> full<WG4134>.
And<WG1161> they that did eat<WG2068> were<WG2258> four thousand<WG5070> men<WG435>, beside<WG5565> women<WG1135> and<WG2532> children<WG3813>.
And<WG2532> he sent away<WG630> the multitude<WG3793>, and took<WG1684> ship<WG1519> <WG4143>, and<WG2532> came<WG2064> into<WG1519> the coasts<WG3725> of Magdala<WG3093>.
